attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If 'true' user can not interact with the button

attributes.name: download
attributes.description:
This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).

attributes.name: full-width
attributes.description: Determines width of the button. If true, the button will take up full width of the container.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description:
Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.
If this property is set, an anchor tag will be rendered.

attributes.name: icon-left
attributes.description: Icon to display to the left side of the button content;

attributes.name: icon-right
attributes.description: Icon to display to the right side of the button content

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description:
Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.
The value is a space-separated list of [link types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types).

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.
Special keywords: `"_blank"`, `"_self"`, `"_parent"`, `"_top"`.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: This attribute indicates the variant of button. Varies by background color and border.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
A hint to the browser for which keyboard to display.
Possible values: ``"text"`, `"tel"`,
`"email"`, `"numeric"`, `"decimal"`, and `"password"`.
